pages.blog: GlamGuru | Tips and secrets Home Products Tips and secrets About Us Contact Tips and Secrets Explore our collection of expert tips and insider secrets to elevate your makeup game and enhance your natural beauty. Latest Makeup Trends Bold Lip Colors Make a statement with bold and vibrant lip colors. From deep reds to electric purples, bold lips are all the rage this season. Glowing Skin Achieve that lit-from-within glow with luminous foundations, highlighters, and illuminating primers. Glowing skin is always in! Graphic Eyeliner Experiment with bold and creative eyeliner looks. From geometric shapes to colorful wings, graphic eyeliner is a fun way to express your creativity. Dewy Complexion Achieve a fresh and dewy complexion with hydrating foundations, dewy setting sprays, and skincare-infused makeup products. Monochromatic Makeup Create cohesive and harmonious makeup looks with monochromatic shades for eyes, lips, and cheeks. It's all about matching hues! Bold Brows Embrace bold and defined brows with brow gels, pencils, and pomades. Fuller brows frame the face and add definition to your look. Cosmetic Ingredients Content Retinol Retinol, a form of vitamin A, is a powerful anti-aging ingredient that helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Hyaluronic Acid Hyaluronic acid is a hydrating ingredient that helps plump and moisturize the skin, reducing the appearance of dryness and fine lines. Vitamin C Vitamin C is an antioxidant ingredient that brightens the skin, evens out skin tone, and protects against environmental damage. Salicylic Acid Salicylic acid is a beta hydroxy acid that helps exfoliate the skin, unclog pores, and reduce acne breakouts. Coenzyme Q10 Coenzyme Q10 is a powerful antioxidant that helps protect the skin from oxidative stress, promoting a youthful appearance. Peptides Peptides are amino acid chains that help stimulate collagen production, improving skin firmness and elasticity. Green Tea Extract Green tea extract is rich in antioxidants and has anti-inflammatory properties, making it ideal for soothing and calming the skin. Alpha Arbutin Alpha arbutin is a skin-brightening ingredient that helps reduce the appearance of dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone. Niacinamide Niacinamide, also known as vitamin B3, helps improve skin texture, minimize pores, and regulate oil production. About Us At GlamGuru, we are passionate about beauty. Our journey began with a simple idea: to provide high-quality cosmetics and beauty products that enhance natural beauty and inspire confidence. Founded in 2010 by makeup artist Emily Smith, GlamGuru quickly became a trusted name in the beauty industry, known for its innovative formulas, trendsetting colors, and commitment to customer satisfaction. Our mission is to empower individuals to express their unique style and creativity through makeup and skincare. We believe that beauty should be inclusive, diverse, and accessible to all. That's why we offer a wide range of products suitable for every skin type, tone, and preference. As a socially responsible company, we are dedicated to sustainability and ethical practices. From sourcing cruelty-free ingredients to reducing our environmental footprint, we strive to make a positive impact on the planet and our communities. Join us on our journey to beauty excellence. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast, skincare aficionado, or simply looking to pamper yourself, we invite you to explore our collection and discover the transformative power of GlamGuru. Home Products Tips and secrets About Us Contact Privacy Policy Terms & Condition

pages.policy: Privacy Policy | GlamGuru main { padding: 50px 0; } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } h1 { margin-bottom: 40px; } h2{ margin-bottom: 20px; } Home Products Tips and secrets About Us Contact Privacy Policy Welcome to the Privacy Policy of GlamGuru. Security We take reasonable precautions to protect the confidentiality and security of your personal information. This includes implementing appropriate physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security. Updates to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Links to Other Sites Our service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the privacy policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services. Consent By using our service, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us By email: GlamGuru@gmail.com By phone number: +916452234951 By mail: L-20, Netaji Subhash Market, Railway Station Rd, Bhilwara, Rajasthan 311001, India Home Products Tips and secrets About Us Contact Privacy Policy Terms & Condition

Tips and secrets About Us Contact Privacy Policy Terms & Condition document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () { const slider = document.querySelector(".slider"); const nextBtn = document.querySelector(".next-btn"); const prevBtn = document.querySelector(".prev-btn"); let currentIndex = 0; const totalSlides = document.querySelectorAll(".slide").length; function nextSlide() { if (currentIndex 0) { currentIndex--; } else { currentIndex = totalSlides - 1; } updateSlider(); } function updateSlider() { const slideWidth = document.querySelector(".slide").offsetWidth; const newPosition = -currentIndex * slideWidth; slider.style.transform = `translateX(${newPosition}px)`; } nextBtn.addEventListener("click", nextSlide); prevBtn.addEventListener("click", prevSlide); });
